snippet: The Rangers scored three times in just over a minute in the third period to rally for a 4-2 win over the host Columbus Blue Jackets on Friday night.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Rangers defeat Columbus Blue Jackets, 4-2, in their season opener; other NHL scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers scored three times in just over a minute in the third period to rally for a 4-2 win over the host Columbus Blue Jackets on Friday night.

headline.print_headline: Rangers Win With Three Quick Goals; Devils Lose Opener
headline.main: Rangers Rally With Three Quick Goals in Third for Victory
